wikipedia_page.main: William George Amor (6 November 1919 – 1 May 1988) was an English amateur footballer who represented Great Britain at the 1948 Summer Olympics, making one appearance. Although he spent the majority of his career in non-league football with teams such as Huntley & Palmers and Metropolitan Police, Amor made 66 appearances in the Football League for Reading between 1947 and 1952.
